publications.title: Roller Madness
publications.details: An interactive innovative first-person shooter game with the objective of shooting boxes to collect points, time bonuses, and time penalties.

publications.title: Shoot 'Em Up
publications.details: A short interactive game with a simple task of collecting coins (as points) and avoiding box-shaped enemies.

publications.title: Image Editor in Python
